entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DisplayPromptAsync not working in iOS 17.4 #24368
  • Maui platform symbols still broken in Vstudio 2022 #24366
  • Change default HybridWebView local address from 0.0.0.0 to something safer #24364
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Change default BlazorWebView local address from 0.0.0.0 to something safer #24363
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Editor control on Windows uses CR as line ending #24361
  • [Android] Toolbar item icon and text disappears when reopening from recent applications. #24357
  • AppThemeBinding BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage and TabbedPage not working #24356
  • [Android] Grid ColumnSpacing affects child's scrollview content size #24354
  • Try to navigation to any XML Page after click on button that's included into IFrame Control #24353
  • More infos on warning: Mismatch between the specified x:DataType and the current binding context #24349
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Nullpointer from ListView.ScrollTo #24347
  • UnauthorizedAccessException while accessing file using FileStream in Android #24346

Closed

  • Can't see Flyout Hambuger or Back icon #24358
  • [Windows] Optimize WrapperView #24309
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] [Android] Setting the background property of AppCompatEditText in a handler mapping does not work #18720
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Windows] Image is not centered in AspectFill mode #10645
    .NET 8 SR9
  • `OnPropertyChanged("Item")` invalid in 'Release' mode #23621
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix "XamlC error: key was not present in the dictionary" when `OnIdiom` is used in… #24367
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Handle focus events using `FocusManager` #24355
    community ✨

Merged

  • Merge `main` into `net9.0` #24341
  • [net9.0] Update sdk and aspnet rc1 #24348
    area-infrastructure
  • 2174059 MAUI hit testing ignores pages loaded by PushModalAsync #24109
  • Release Versioning for 8.0.81 #24359
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr8] Update the mac/iOS workloads #24321
  • [Android] Allow custom background drawable with a custom handler #22573
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-entry, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-editor
  • [Binding SG] Enable usage of private fields and properties in SetBinding path #23810
    area-xaml
  • Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their counterparts #24256
  • Fix `dotnet new maui` trim warnings when publish with trimMode full #24314
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-image
  • [X] Match behavior of compiled bindings with indexers to their non-compiled counterparts #24229
  • Update the mac/iOS workloads #24263
  • Optimize UI Tests build time in CI by only building TestCases.HostApp #24334
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Obsolete Compatibility.Layout #24342
  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview
  • Run device tests on the previous TFMs #23896
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-rc1
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
  • [IOS ]Fix border has an unexpected background animation #24227
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Bugfix/22469 ios label crash #22487
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Move some absolute layout api docs directly in code #24332
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Migrate xml docs directly into code for ExtensionPoints #24333
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • 894511 : Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24161
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Entry clear button is not taking the color of the text. #24196
    community ✨
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    community ✨
  • Fixed the CollectionView GroupFooterTemplate crashes the application #24205
    community ✨
  • Update FlyoutPage.cs #24339
    community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
  • [Android] SecureStorage: Rework logic to delete shared prefs when key is corrupt #23850
    area-essentials
